summary: Is he the village idiot or a genius in disguise? 17 year old Noi drifts through life on a remote fjord in the north of Iceland. In winter, the fjord is cut off from the outside world, ... See full summary »
cast: Tómas Lemarquis|Þröstur Leó Gunnarsson|Elín Hansdóttir|Anna Friðriksdóttir|Hjalti Rögnvaldsson|Pétur Einarsson|Kjartan Bjargmundsson|Þorsteinn Gunnarsson|Guðmundur Ólafsson|Haraldur Jónsson|Gérard Lemarquis|Greipur Gíslason|Páll Loftsson|Ásdís Thoroddsen|Ásmundur Ásmudsson|Óttarr Proppé|Gunnhildur Björk Elíasdóttir|Unnar Reynisson|Sveinn Geirsson|Þorgeir Guðmundsson|Helgi E. Helgason
title: Noi, el albino
